v1.headline: Co-founder and CEO @ Flexlab.io | Helping startups and enterprises save 80% on software development teams. Saved 200+ companies over $5M+ on tech costs.
v1.about:
Helping businesses scale their software development for 6 years now. We helped over 200 companies: 10x their software development, while saving $5M+/year on hiring, and raising over $10M+ of venture capital funding from technology investors - like early Uber investor Jason Calanacis and YCombinator.

We aren’t just another outsourced IT firm or dev shop. We provide businesses with a meticulously vetted team of software development professionals - including engineers, designers, and product managers - while also helping them save up to 80% on technology operations. How?

First, we leverage our expertise evaluating thousands of codebases from early stage startups to large scale enterprises and financial institutions - to provide a free technical audit and personalized roadmap to scale your software development.

Understanding the unique challenges and requirements of your projects, we’ll build flexible and scalable teams of software development professionals, allowing you to adjust your team size based on project demands. Our direct management approach eliminates the overhead of hiring and training, ensuring that our team hits the ground running from Day 1. Within just 30 days of engagement, we guarantee the delivery of a new feature or product improvement, and if not met, our services continue at no additional cost until we fulfill this promise.

Our clients have seen astonishing results. One of our clients was able to launch their software solution in just 1 month, onboard 30,000 users, and raise millions of dollars from venture capital investors in the technology space - all while saving an upwards of $300k/yearly by working with FlexLab to augment their software development.

Now here’s one last question for you…

Do you want to transform your software development process and cut costs by 80% - by partnering with FlexLab?
